posts.post_content:
Some of you got to see this at Valley Forge. By far the nicest one I've owned, but I've only had a total of 3. the issue in the one corner is some minor creasing/cracking, there is some light staining on the reverse. 

Asking $300, will consider offers, but will probably wait a day or two before I respond to lower than full asking.

Will obviously ship insured and well packaged and I always ship and insure at no additional cost. 

Paypal goods and services only.
